long_description: The talented Continental Race King 2.2 tire wins races and performs well across a wide variety of cross-country terrain. Large volume casing is mated to a low-profile tread pattern, creating a speedy tire with incredible all-around traction and control. DuraSkin(R) polyamide layer provides excellent sidewall protection without adding extra weight or compromising supple ride quality. 180 TPI casing. Wire bead non-foldable design.
short_description: The talented Continental Race King 2.2 tire wins races and performs well across a wide variety of cross-country terrain.
